name: BIBBOB
description:
A game about 2 lab specimens that are able to fuse!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ CONTROLS

Arrows - Movement

Space - Interact / Jump

R - Switch Characters

F - Fuse (you have to be near each other)

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ CREDITS

Everything besides music - DangoHz

Music by Eggy Toast -> check him out here! https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eggy-toast/redaction/condemned/
